TextView.android:text:
Default password is nothing, just click on OK. 
 This app helps you to Remember your user name and password from different website.

 Save Credentials: Just Give the name of the website that you want to save Password from, Give the username and Password and click on Save.

 Load Credentials: You can see your saved password in this page. Just choose the website that you have saved earlier to see the Username and Password.

 Delete Credentials: Delete your Credentials.
